TopicTitle: [Flying Sub]Just imagine something like this in KSP!

Articles.Content:
If KSP had a underewater, i would make something like this beauty =D

The whole concept of underwater->Flight-->underwater again , is very inspiring..

please not that this is just a concept.

Edited May 3, 2013 by icemasterpt
Better Title
Well, I prefer the Flying Sub from Voyage to the Bottom of the Sea. Much more sexy.

Trust the russians for coming up with strange concepts.

As for underwater, there used to be a mod to create submarines. It might even still work.

The Japanese had a sub that deployed 3 aircraft, but man, a sub jet is wierd. but then again Someone (cant remember who) did think about trying to make flying tanks as well.

Edited May 3, 2013 by Nexustrimean
Clarity
I'm not Russian but... Russian concept>All.
I had an idea like this once, it was basicly a helicopter that was waterproof which landed in the water and used its rotor blades to move around underwater, pretty epic if you ask me.
I'd rather have them simulate ground-effect

but then again they did think about trying to make flying tanks as well.

I don't know if Walter Christie counts as 'they', but yeah. An interesting idea on paper, but that's all the farther it should have went.

Unless of course you count the Wathog as a flying tank, but that's not exactly what Christie had in mind.

The Japanese had a sub that deployed 3 aircraft, but man, a sub jet is wierd. but then again they did think about trying to make flying tanks as well.

That was the first thing I though of watching that video

Maybe SQUAD will put in more water related stuff after the game is finished, who knows? That would be sweet...

Ah nothing like WIG craft. The US coast guard and the UN thought they were going to be the next big thing, so every mariner has to learn all about them and how to not hit them. Thank goodness they didn't think about submarine planes, though they do seem extremely Kerbal, especially with boosters added!.
